Here's the actual E-Mail address, in case you don't like your native Email client(It's okay, no one does) ContactJaimer@gmail.com

Some Tips so that I don't end up having the E-Mail in my Junk Folder

  1. Don't write the word "Free", Write "Accepting Gratuities"
  2. Don't have the word "Amazon" or "Ebay" anywhere
  3. Write "Job Offer", this works
